metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12481 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in GPAC 0.7.1. There is a NULL pointer dereferencein the function GetESD at isomedia/track.c in libgpac.a, as demonstrated byMP4Box.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12481` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
gpac-modules-base - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
libgpac10 - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gpac package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1+dfsg1-3').
